name: Deck Wars
description:
Deck Wars is a multiplayer tactical card game. Collect and make the deadliest deck before throwing your heroes in the arena! Follow a compelling story and fight all the game bosses or join an alliance and battle in real time against players from all over the world. Use your cards wisely to make devastating combos! Upgrade your heroes and manage your castle resources to stay on top of the game. Explore the game’s world, make memorable encounters, and assemble an invincible deck on your journey. With cute graphics and an easy to learn combat system, Deck Wars is for every player.

PVP MODE: Duel against players from the whole world during epic confrontations! Join a guild overcome the greatest challenges with your friends.

BUILD AN INVINCIBLE DECK: Upgrade your cards and raise the stakes! Equip your heroes with the best equipment and power up your spells to make the best combos!

MANAGE YOUR CASTLE: In Deck Wars you will be king in your own castle. Manage your resources, upgrade your buildings and conquer forts to get extra loot！

EXPLORE A FANTASY WORLD: Make your way through a world filled with fantasy and magic and follow a compelling story starring interesting character…

JOIN THE BATTLE: Ultimately Deck Wars is an easy to pick up tactical game. Throw yourself in the battlefield, win your duels and get epic rewards!
